description: My place is close to Shake Shack, Starbucks, Trader Joe's, Fairway, Madison Square Park, Empire State Building, East River Ferry. You’ll love my place because of the location, the views, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Amazing Apartment in Lively Manhattan Neighborhood
review: The place was better decorated than many of the other airbnbs I've been to. Perfect for a group of friends or couples. Love the paintings and everything is comfortable. Nicole was fantastic with communication beforehand and accommodating to our tentative and frequently changing departure plans.  Would definitely visit again!
